price: Ese es el día en que se establecerá total justicia. Quien quiera, entonces, que busque refugio en Su Señor.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡيَوۡمُ ٱلۡحَقُّۖ فَمَن شَآءَ ٱتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِۦ مَـَٔابًا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: dhālika al-yawmu al-ḥaqu faman shāa ittakhadha ilā rabbihi maāban
